member.name: T:Google.GData.Client.Samples.ExecRequest
member.summary:
simple pull app for a GData Feed Usage is ExecRequest service cmd uri username password, where cmd is QUERY, UPDATE, INSERT, DELETE or ExecRequest service cmd uri /a authsubtoken - to use a session token or ExecRequest service cmd uri /e authsubtoken - to exchance a one time token for a session token
To upload data you can use a syntax like this: ExecRequest myService POST http://whereever Joe@Smith secret < uploadfile.xml

member.name: M:Google.GData.Client.Samples.ExecRequest.Main(System.String[])
member.summary: The main entry point for the application.
